vote.title: (1) A public hearing to receive comments on the adoption of Reprogramming Budget No. 1 (Substantial Amendment No. 1) to the FY 2024-25 Action Plan to use unspent Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) in the amount of $1,335,555.00 on repairs and renovations at public facilities; and (2) at the close of the public hearing, authorize final adoption of Reprogramming Budget No. 1 (Substantial Amendment No. 1) to the FY 2024-25 Action Plan - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
vote.description: (1) A public hearing to receive comments on the adoption of Reprogramming Budget No. 1 (Substantial Amendment No. 1) to the FY 2024-25 Action Plan to use unspent Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) in the amount of $1,335,555.00 on repairs and renovations at public facilities; and (2) at the close of the public hearing, authorize final adoption of Reprogramming Budget No. 1 (Substantial Amendment No. 1) to the FY 2024-25 Action Plan - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
